# Plotly

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```
```{r}
data("instacart")
## kept only soy lactosefree products
instacart = instacart |>
  filter(
    aisle_id %in%c(91)
  )

```

```{r}
instacart |> 
  count(product_name)|>
  mutate(product_name = fct_reorder(product_name, n)) |> 
  plot_ly(x = ~product_name, y = ~n, color = ~product_name, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```
